title: Is the Moon "alive"? Scientists find signs of active tectonics beneath its surface
desc: New research suggests the Moon is still tectonically active, with small ridges and moonquakes revealing ongoing crustal movement. This is a key concern for future Artemis missions that will be launched by NASA.
